tool_description: Initiates background check requests with external screening services for criminal history, employment verification, and other required checks based on volunteer role requirements.

applicant_id.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer applicant

full_name.description: Full legal name of the applicant

social_security_number.description: SSN or national identifier for background check

address_history.description: List of addresses where applicant has lived in past 7 years

check_types.description: Types of checks needed (criminal, employment, education, reference, driving_record)

role_level.description: Risk level of volunteer role (low, medium, high)

consent_date.description: Date applicant provided consent for background check

error_messages: Missing required personal information: Provide complete name, DOB, and SSN
Invalid check types: Use combinations of [criminal, employment, education, reference, driving_record]
Invalid role level: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Expired consent: Consent date must be within last 30 days
Insufficient address history: Provide at least current address
usage: Submit applicant personal information and specify required background check types based on volunteer role to initiate screening process with external services.

request_id.description: Unique identifier for the background check request

estimated_completion.description: Expected date when results will be available

cost.description: Total cost for requested background checks

status.description: Current status of the background check request
